author: hboutemy
msg: display environment used to run ITs in published site

author: sergeyb
msg: [CXF-4001] Using InputStream available on the message when checking for form parameters

author: juanpablo
msg: - added org.apache.wiki.migration package. Initially, it contains the needed classes to load a set of (initial) plain txt files, but could be improved/extended to perform a 2.8 migration (see comments on JSPWIKI-454). Added some tests for this package.
- added new i18n resource, "install.initialPageDir.description", in default.properties (line 512) to ask user where are located the initial pages to load.

author: juanpablo
msg: - quick navigation image is mis-placed outside quick navigation box (see attached p1.png) (may be because of that, horizontal scroll appears on view page)
- edit area should get as wide as it can
- horizontal & vertical scrolls appear on edit page
- tooltip on quick navigation button refers to ?find.submit.go?

because of the last item, the i18n resource with key org.apache.wiki.action.SearchActionBean.go in CoreResources_*.properties has been moved to sbox.go in default_*.properties (also, the es translation contains some more fixes).
Finally, main layouts weren't including doctypes inside the layout itself which caused some other style issues.
